name: Mini Strawberry Hand Pies
author: Yoly
summary: I was looking for an easy and simple recipe to use up some strawberries that I had. Made with only 4 ingredients. Serve as-is or top with a powdered sugar and milk glaze.
ingredients: ½ (15 ounce) package refrigerated pie crust
directions: Bring pie crust to room temperature
Place strawberries in a bowl and sprinkle with sugar
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Use a 4-inch pastry cutter to cut out 6 rounds
Divide strawberries equally amongst the 6 rounds
Wet fingers with water and run them along the edges of each round
Fold rounds in half and press edges together using the tines of a fork until sealed
Transfer to the prepared baking sheet
Brush with beaten egg and cut a small slit in each pie
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 20 to 25 minutes
